ingredients.content: ½ oz extra virgin olive oil
⅛ tsp ground white pepper, to taste

preparations.content: Place potatoes, onions, garlic and olive oil into mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula and without measuring cup, cook <b>5 min/250°F/speed 1<b>.
Add peas, milk, vegetable stock, salt and pepper, insert measuring cup and cook <b>11 min/195°F/speed 1<b>, then blend <b>1 min/speed 4<b>-10<b>, increasing speed gradually.
